backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining StudySession type and CRUD operations (addSession, completeSession, getAllSessions, calculateCompletionRate) using a Map-based schedule store.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (homepage, input form, progress tracker, motivational quotes, responsive design) to their source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend source files describing their purpose and functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles defining OKLCH color system variables for light and dark themes with soft, student-friendly color palette.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with viewport meta tag, page title, root div, and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring TanStack Router with routes for home, create-plan, progress, and motivation pages, wrapped in ThemeProvider and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying copyright year and attribution link to caffeine.ai with UTM tracking parameters.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Layout wrapper providing consistent page structure with Navigation header, main content outlet, and Footer.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Responsive navigation bar with logo, desktop menu links, mobile hamburger menu, and active route highlighting.
frontend/src/components/SubjectProgressC: Card component displaying subject-specific progress with completion percentage, progress bar, session counts, and button to mark next session complete.
frontend/src/data/quotes.ts: Array of 20 motivational quotes with text and author fields focused on studying, learning, and academic success.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that manages the backend actor instance using React Query, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options for idle handling and delegation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching study sessions and completion rate data, plus mutations for adding and completing sessions with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a soft, calming color palette for light and dark themes, including primary colors, chart colors, and sidebar styling.
frontend/src/lib/studyPlanGenerator.ts: Generates personalized study plans by calculating priority scores based on exam dates and difficulty levels, distributing study sessions across days with automatic revision scheduling before exams.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page component featuring a hero section with gradient background and feature cards highlighting AI-powered planning, smart scheduling, progress tracking, and strategic revision capabilities.
frontend/src/pages/MotivationalQuotes.ts: Displays random motivational quotes with a refresh button and grid of sample quotes, using card components with gradient styling and quote data from an imported quotes array.
frontend/src/pages/ProgressTracker.tsx: React component that displays study progress with overall completion rate, subject-specific progress cards, upcoming sessions, and statistics. Includes loading states and empty state with a call-to-action to create a study plan.
frontend/src/pages/StudyPlanForm.tsx: React form component for creating AI-powered study plans where users input subjects, exam dates, difficulty levels, and daily study hours. Validates inputs, generates sessions using an AI algorithm, and saves them to the backend.
frontend/src/types/studyPlan.ts: TypeScript type definitions for study plan data structures including SubjectInput, StudySession, and StudyPlan interfaces.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, extended theme settings for borders, shadows, fonts, and animations for the UI component library.
project_state.json: Project metadata file documenting the Smart Study Planner AI application architecture, existing features, image requirements, and feature request tracking with a frontend-only, responsive design approach.
